info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 1:27PM EST until January 12 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Blacksburg VA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Carolina...Virginia... Dan River near the City of Danville, as well as Rockingham, Caswell and Pittsylvania Counties. Dan River at Dan River at Paces affecting Halifax County. Dan River at South Boston affecting Halifax County. For the Dan River...including Danville, Dan River at Paces, South Boston...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING TO FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Dan River at Dan River at Paces. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening to Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Low spots along routes 658 and 671 begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 5.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is 18.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow evening to a crest of 23.5 feet Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - For flooding safety information, please visit http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 130 AM EST.
